relation: Darrow - #36 Titanic Ant proves to be all too powerful for close quarter combat. Perhaps Ness should consider growing another pair of arms.
Darrow3 - #32 After an explanation that doesn't quite explain things properly, Ness discovers the true secret to teleporting: RUN REALLY FAST!
Darrow - #37 Ness attempts a last ditch effort to win the fight...and promptly fails. That's one heck of a throw, though.

Darrow3 - #33 Just because you've learned to teleport, doesn't mean you have to save the world or anything. For our little monkey friend, it is just a convenient way to cut lines at his favorite burger joint.

Darrow - #38 Remembering Picky's motto, Ness suddenly awakens to a new possiblity. Remember, when a young main hero is at the end of his ropes, a special skill will always save him at the last minute!
textBeforeTable: > 9 8 1 0 < Other Submissions by Darrow A wonderful journey begins as a disembodied voice runs Ness through the events that brought him to where he is now.
